xml:
Liquid
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 15 (excluding Locoid Crelo topical emulsion) - Caution: flammable. Keep your body away from fire or flames after you have put on the medicine

Label 28 - Spread thinly on the affected skin only

Excipients

May contain

Butylated hydroxytoluene, cetostearyl alcohol (including cetyl and stearyl alcohol), hydroxybenzoates (parabens), propylene glycol

Locoid 0.1% scalp lotion <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Astellas Pharma Ltd)</ph> 3779011000001107

Hydrocortisone butyrate 1 mg per 1 ml

  • 100 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £6.83

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £6.83

Locoid Crelo 0.1% topical emulsion <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Astellas Pharma Ltd)</ph> 4019211000001107

Hydrocortisone butyrate 1 mg per 1 gram

  • 100 gram POM

    NHS indicative price = £5.91

HYDROCORTISONE BUTYRATE
